boat.name: Doris
boat.full_description:
Based quite closely on the Humber Canoe Yawls. Two lug sails, the mizzen set very close to the stern.

Fully decked with high combings and a raised seat for the helmsman on the side deck.

The very long centerboard only hinges down about 30 degrees as per the Humber Yawls drawn by Holmes and Strange. The draft with the board down is 2.45 ft.

nb a previous owner has had the area covered by the first reef cut off in one of the mainsails! I gave the original sail area but 2ft 3inchs have been removed from the luff  / vertical hight of one main sail! There is still another full sized mainsail that is suitable for racing, the small sail is better for single handed sailing.
boat.short_description: A Canoe Yawl designed by David Moss that has similarities to George Holmes (eg EEL) and Albert Strange's Humber Yawls

for_sales.sales_text:
Doris is a Sea Otter 15 from the yard of the award winning boat builder David Moss at Skippool creek near Blackpool. The Sea Otter 15 is a fully decked, minimally ballasted day boat with a lug main and mizzen on unstayed masts. With two sails set on booms tacking is simple but sailing requires some skill to get the best out of her. She came second in her class, three up in light winds in the 2021 Maldon Regatta. David has developed his Sea Otter range of double ended Canoe Yawls following his apprenticeship building local double ended pilot boats. David's tapering strip planking follows the conventional line of the sheer. as would be the case in carvel boatbuilding, allowing the bright finished interior to show the wood grain. The outside of the hull is faired and covered in hardwood veneer producing a very fine paint finished surface. Doris had her 21st birthday this year but you would be hard pressed to guess that from her well maintained appearance.

Doris comes complete with two sets of sails, cockpit and travelling covers, a decent pair of oars, buoyancy, Honda 2.3 long shaft outboard (2020) and a well prepared road trailer plus the usual required extras. See Davidmossboatbuilders.co.uk
